publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2.4 Mr John Swinney: As an amendment to the motion (S1M-2) in the name of Mr Jim Wallace, leave out all after "Scottish Executive" and insert "to bring forward to the Parliament proposals for the abolition of tuition fees and to appoint urgently a Committee of inquiry on the issue of financial support for those participating, part-time or full-time, in further and higher education; the terms of reference, timescale and membership of that Committee to be approved by and its report laid before the Parliament". Supported by: Mr Brian Monteith, Dennis Canavan, Tommy Sheridan, Robin Harper.
